title: Amazon FBA Launch Program
description: A step‑by‑step program to launch your first product on Amazon using the FBA model.

sequences.title: Foundation
sequences.description: Set up the legal and operational basics for your e‑commerce business.

tasks.title: Open a business bank account
instructions: Research banks with favourable fees and online services.
Prepare your LLC documents and EIN.
Open the account and obtain debit cards.

tasks.title: Create your Amazon Seller Central account
instructions: Navigate to Amazon Seller Central and begin registration.
Verify your identity and finish the setup.

sequences.title: Validate
sequences.description: Identify and validate product opportunities through data driven research.

tasks.title: Score five product opportunities
instructions: Use the opportunity scoring spreadsheet to assess demand and competition.
Ensure each product meets minimum margin thresholds.

tasks.title: Create a supplier shortlist
instructions: For your top two products, research at least three suppliers each.
Record pricing, MOQs, and compliance considerations.

rubric: Provide at least five scored products with calculated margin and competition notes.
Show evidence of at least three suppliers per shortlisted product.
Include notes on risks and next steps.
